Title: An Act Changing the Name of the Aklan Provincial Hospital in the Municipality of Kalibo, Province of Aklan, to Dr. Rafael S. Tumbokon Memorial Hospital
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 78
An Act Changing the Name of the Aklan Provincial Hospital in the Municipality of Kalibo, Province of Aklan, to Dr. Rafael S. Tumbokon Memorial Hospital
Section 1. The name of the Aklan Provincial Hospital in the Municipality of Kalibo, Province of Aklan, is hereby changed to Dr. Rafael S. Tumbokon Memorial Hospital.
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: June 16, 1980
